welcome_message_body: Welcome to the enchanting city of Vatican City! Get ready to experience the rich history, breathtaking art and architecture, and spiritual significance this city is renowned for. Enjoy your stay and dive into all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and main terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at the airport, used for long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access.
